title: Technology Research Fund for the Pediatric Clinic at Barbara Davis Center
description: To provide support for clinical research including salary support for the MD's, RN's and RA's working on the complete bionic pancreas study at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide support for clinical research including salary support for the MD's, RN's and RA's working on the complete bionic pancreas study at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
